participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, always seeking new ways to express herself through art.
participant_1.background: I am feeling lost and confused about my future. I am a gourmet cook. I'm not sure what my ethnicity is. I try to stay active and eat healthy to make myself feel younger. I need to find a way to balance my love of binge watching with my need to focus on my art.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Chill and thoughtful, with a passion for music and storytelling.
participant_2.background: I like to wear dark, comfortable clothing that fits well. My favorite band is the muggers. I love fresh seafood and vegetables from the Pacific Northwest. I used to race cars, but now I prefer to spend my time reading and writing. Music has always been my number one passion.

content.text: Hey, how's it going?
Pretty good! I'm making a fresh seafood dinner.
Yum, I love seafood! What are you making?
I'm making some salmon with a side of roasted vegetables.
Sounds delicious!
Thanks! How about you, what are you up to today?
I'm working on a new painting.
Oh, that's cool! What kind of painting?
It's a portrait of my friend's dog.
Oh, that sounds cute! I love dogs.
Me too! They're the best.
I know, right? I have a dog of my own.
What kind of dog?
A golden retriever.
Oh, I love golden retrievers! They're so friendly.
They are! Mine is a big cuddler.
That sounds so nice. I'm jealous!
Don't be! You can always come over and visit him.
Thanks for the offer! I might just take you up on that.
Anytime
